title: An Act providing for utility shutoff protections during periods of extreme heat

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Comerford, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2612) (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Joanne M. Comerford for legislation to provide for utility shutoff protections during periods of extreme heat.  Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy

related_entities.name: committee on Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/13/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
Hearing rescheduled to 11/13/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-2                                               and Virtual Hearing location changed
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means
